info.author: Jason Grimm
info.description: It includes support for actions like reclamation and rescheduling of orphaned instances (instance fault tolerance) and volumes (volume fault tolerance), resource load balancing (predictive resource rescheduling to achieve consistent load distribution), automation of resource snapshot and movement (both instance and volumes) and similar availability services and actions.
info.name: overcast
info.summary: Project Overcast is a set of "less cloudy" enterprise-like services for OpenStack, i.e. OpenStack Resource Availability Service.
info.html_description: It includes support for actions like reclamation and rescheduling of orphaned instances (instance fault tolerance) and volumes (volume fault tolerance), resource load balancing (predictive resource rescheduling to achieve consistent load distribution), automation of resource snapshot and movement (both instance and volumes) and similar availability services and actions.
